body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park     Join Our Friends              Join Our Friends      Please go here if you are trying to reach the park's cooperating association, the San Francisco Maritime National Park Association.   Â   Friends of the San Francisco Maritime Museum Library Join the Friends of the San Francisco Maritime Museum Library and help support the Library at San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park.   The Friends welcome members who are interested in maritime books, photos, oral histories and maritime lore. Membership includes reduced admission to Friends' events, free admission to Hyde Street Pier, and discounts on Friends' booksale purchases. Please call 415-561-7040.
title: San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park: Join Our Friends
